lines.text: ...Um. Hm. I'm having a hard time thinking of how unlit, melted candles could've killed someone.
Maybe before they melted, the wizard threw them at him really hard?
The deceased shows no signs of head trauma. I doubt it.
Also, the wizard's an old old man. He looks like his pitching arm wouldn't make the cut in Little League.
Alright, yeah, maybe that wasn't the best idea.
